sentences.sContent: The details of the implementation depend on how we represent time.
sentences.sContent_eng: The details of the implementation depend on how we represent time.
sentences.sCn: 这些实现的细节依赖于我们如何去表示时间。

sentences.sContent: They do, however, greatly affect the implementation of those patterns.
sentences.sContent_eng: They do, however, greatly affect the implementation of those patterns.
sentences.sCn: 然而，它们的确对那些模式的实现影响很大。

sentences.sContent: It allows us to separate the specification of the object (how you interact with it) from the implementation.
sentences.sContent_eng: It allows us to separate the specification of the object (how you interact with it) from the implementation.
sentences.sCn: 它允许我们从实现中剥离对象的规范（如何与它交互）。

remMethod.val: 来自implement(v. 实施； 实现)
